verses.kjv: And he shewed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the LORD, and Satan standing at his right hand to resist him.
verses.ct: Then he showed me Joshua the high priest standing in the presence of the angel of the LORD, with Satan standing at his right side to accuse him.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, The LORD rebuke thee, O Satan; even the LORD that hath chosen Jerusalem rebuke thee: is not this a brand plucked out of the fire?
verses.ct: The LORD said to Satan, "May the LORD rebuke you, Satan! May the LORD who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Isn't this man like a burning stick pulled from the fire?"

verses.kjv: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.
verses.ct: Now Joshua was dressed in filthy clothes as he stood in the presence of the angel.

verses.kjv: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
verses.ct: The angel spoke to those standing nearby and said, "Remove those filthy clothes from him." Then he said to Joshua, "Look — I have taken your sin away from you, and I will dress you in fine new clothing."

verses.kjv: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the LORD stood by.
verses.ct: Then I said, "Put a clean turban on his head." So they placed a clean turban on his head and dressed him in new garments while the angel of the LORD stood watching.

verses.kjv: And the angel of the LORD protested unto Joshua, saying,
verses.ct: Then the angel of the LORD solemnly charged Joshua, saying,

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; If thou wilt walk in my ways, and if thou wilt keep my charge, then thou shalt also judge my house, and shalt also keep my courts, and I will give thee places to walk among these that stand by.
verses.ct: "This is what the LORD of hosts says: If you follow my ways and carry out my instructions, then you will govern my temple and oversee my courts, and I will give you a place among those standing here."

verses.kjv: Hear now, O Joshua the high priest, thou, and thy fellows that sit before thee: for they are men wondered at: for, behold, I will bring forth my servant the BRANCH.
verses.ct: "Listen carefully, Joshua the high priest — you and your companions seated with you — because you are men who serve as a sign of things to come. Pay attention: I am going to bring my servant, the Branch."

verses.kjv: For behold the stone that I have laid before Joshua; upon one stone shall be seven eyes: behold, I will engrave the graving thereof, saith the LORD of hosts, and I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.
verses.ct: "Look at the stone I have placed in front of Joshua — on that single stone are 7 eyes. Pay attention: I myself will engrave an inscription on it," declares the LORD of hosts, "and I will remove the sin of this land in a single day."

verses.kjv: In that day, saith the LORD of hosts, shall ye call every man his neighbour under the vine and under the fig tree.
verses.ct: "On that day," declares the LORD of hosts, "each of you will invite your neighbor to sit under your vine and under your fig tree."
